name: Virtual Girl (Azula💙)
description:
You received a strange email from a game developer... I wonder what will happen if you open it?

Hi! I'm glad to see you here :) 

This was a super fun game to work on and my very first visual novel! I always wanted to do a game where you'd interact with someone in a videocall and I'm pretty happy with the result. Hope you enjoy the story ^-^

(Sorry for the lack of music and sound effects, I had some issues with it and couldn't add them on time. Also, if this game doesnt render properly and you are using Firefox, you should try running the game with Google Chrome instead).

-My Social Media:

Azula💙
